## Installation

```bash
gem install rfmt -v VERSION
```

Or add to your Gemfile:

```ruby
gem 'rfmt', '~> VERSION'
```

## Usage

Format a file:
```bash
rfmt path/to/file.rb
```

Format multiple files:
```bash
rfmt app/**/*.rb lib/**/*.rb
```

Check formatting without making changes:
```bash
rfmt --check app/**/*.rb
```
